title: PBE? is riot trolling me?
body:
So i have the pbe login screen updates/downloads completed, my acount is "registered" , but when i log in it says i have the wrong username/acount even though i logged in perfectly fine with the live client as apposed to the PBE client. RIOT?
 http://prntscr.com/gxu1yp
http://prntscr.com/gxu1tm

replies.body: Think I found the problem, there doesn't look like there is any account on PBE with that username. Your Live and PBE account can have different usernames, so double check that to see what you should be using.
